long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is similar to the 'Steam Inventory Helper' extension, designed to help users efficiently manage and access detailed information within their Steam inventory. It is particularly beneficial for users with a large number of items, as it streamlines the process of checking item availability dates and other relevant details, saving time and enhancing the overall Steam inventory management experience.

To use this extension, simply click on the extension icon and press a button. All the necessary information about your Steam inventory will be downloaded instantly, providing you with quick and easy access to the data you need.
